text:
Kinnek in NYC is hiring! We are looking for Senior Backend and Frontend Devs. Minimum 7 years of experience.

Kinnek is an online marketplace ( the first, and largest) for small business purchasing. We are a Series B funded start up (Matrix and Thrive). We have a 10- person dev team that we are looking to expand!

Tech Stack: Our tech stack: Unix, Python, Django, MySQL, REDIS, JS, Angular and looking to expand our horizons!

Check us out, if you are interested contact me directly : nathalie@kinnek.com

#micdrop
